name: Mcsherr Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mcsherr Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Richmond, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.5M in Medicaid payments across 7K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
